CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 场景；场面；情景；事发地；现场；事件；（戏剧、书、电影等的）片段；情节；（戏剧的）一场；布景；活动领域；圈子；（某地方或图画中的）景色；景象；（当众）发脾气；吵闹

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指旅游观光的风光，包括城市景色或自然风光景色。也指人造景物或奇特的景色。
指具体的、局部的或一时的景色，可以是自然形成的，也可人工造成的。
指一个国家或某一地区的整体自然风景。
普通和词，多指从远处或高处所见的景色。
多指在内陆的自然风光。
一般特指戏剧或小说所写的环境或场所。
指或大或小的地方，既可指供专门用途或特定活动的地点，又可指某一事件的地址。
多指物体相对于其他物体所处的位置或状态。
指某物设置的方向或地点。
常指真实事件或虚构故事发生的地点。
指某物所处的客观位置和周围地区。
含义广泛，最普通用词，既可指很小的地点，又可指很大很远的地方或场所。
指物体在其周围环境中所处的位置或状态，侧重地点或场所的环境特征。
指相对较小的特定地点或事物所在地。

word_group.brief_definition: 作事前的现场（或情况）描述；作准备
犯罪现场；罪案现场；案发现场
事故现场；事故场景；车祸现场
夜间场景；夜景；夜晚现场
终场；最后一幕；最后场景
谋杀现场；凶杀场景；杀人现场
性爱场景；性场面；色情场景
死亡场景；死亡现场；死亡场面

bilingual.source: She goes to the scene of the crime to find the facts.
bilingual.target: 她去犯罪现场寻找事实。

bilingual.source: The csi team arrived at the scene within minutes.
bilingual.target: 犯罪现场调查小组在几分钟内到达了现场。

bilingual.source: The correspondent reported live from the scene of the accident.
bilingual.target: 记者从事故现场进行了现场直播报道。

bilingual.source: The csi collected all the evidence from the crime scene.
bilingual.target: 犯罪现场调查员收集了犯罪现场的所有证据。

bilingual.source: The correspondents reported live from the scene of the earthquake.
bilingual.target: 通讯记者从地震现场进行了现场直播报道。

bilingual.source: The jemmy was left at the crime scene.
bilingual.target: 撬棍被留在了犯罪现场。

bilingual.source: The fire scene was filled with thick smoke.
The detective cased the scene for clues.
bilingual.target: 侦探包裹了现场寻找线索。

list.abstract: scene（英 [siːn]，美 [siːn]），英语单词，作名词时，为发生地点；现场；一段情节。短语搭配有set the scene（作事前的现场描述）。例句为“Digital cameras arrived on the scene in 1997.（数码相机于1997年问世。）” scene名词类近义词有event、circumstance等。

yingyinNormal.en: Special enzymes arrive at the scene and chop the virus to pieces.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特殊的酶赶到现场，把病毒切成数块。

yingyinNormal.en: Additional CDC personnel are on the scene in Dallas and Cleveland.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其他的疾控中心人员就在达拉斯和克利夫兰的现场。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Blood. Quite a bit of it, too. Was there any injury at the crime scene? Nah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？血。而且还不少。犯罪现场有人受伤吗？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: You sure it's Ortiz? My gun at the crime scene? It's not a coincidence. He offered to clean it for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你确定是奥蒂兹？我的枪在犯罪现场，这不是巧合，他之前主动要帮我清理。

yingyinNormal.en: 10 grand? It gets worse. Weapon found at the crime scene traces back to you. You're wanted for murder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一万？还有更糟的，犯罪现场发现的凶器追查到你身上了，你以谋杀罪被通缉了。

yingyinNormal.en: He didn't arrive until several hours later, which means he couldn't have seen his wife's killer leaving the scene. He lied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是几个小时后才到家的，就是说，他不可能看到杀害他妻子的凶手离开现场，他撒谎了。

yingyinNormal.en: According to witnesses, there was a hail of gunfire from other SWAT and sheriff members on the scene, and the bullets that killed Mr. Gardner may have...
yingyinNormal.zh: 根据目击证人表示，当时现场开枪射击的，还有其他特警和法警，击中加德纳先生的可能...

yingyinNormal.en: I'm hearing now that the president received at least one gunshot to the abdomen, possibly more, that he clutched his stomach, that he fell instantly to the ground, and there were screams, people panicking, that it has been very chaotic at that scene.
yingyinNormal.zh: 导播现在告诉我总统至少腹部中了一枪，也许不止，他紧捂腹部，立即倒地，现场尖叫连连，人群陷入恐慌，场面十分混乱。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the diner scene. Where's my diner scene?
yingyinNormal.zh: 餐厅的场戏没了，我餐厅那场戏呢？

yingyinNormal.en: The baby! Rachel! Right, right! Oh, I love this scene.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋要生了。对，我喜欢这场戏。

yingyinNormal.en: I've watched it 36 times, except for the snake scene and the face-melting scene, which I can only watch when it's still light out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我欣赏过36遍除了蛇群和脸融化的镜头，那些只有灯亮着我才敢看。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm so proud of you. We haven't even gotten to my scene yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真为你感到骄傲。我都还没有出场呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine. In the parlance of the urban music scene, "what's the 4-1-1"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，用城市音乐[黑人音乐]的术语来说"你想跟我说啥"？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait a minute. She just made a scene in the middle of the ceremony.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她破坏了正在进行中的婚礼。

yingyinNormal.en: No, there was supposed to be a big scene with me and Mark Harmon, but it's gone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不对啊，应该有一场我和马克哈蒙的对手戏，但不见了。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? What, because I'm struggling with the grief scene? You said I would get there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？因为我演不好苦情戏吗？你说过我会演好的。

yingyinNormal.en: You're back. I can't believe it. If you knew how many times I'd imagined this scene.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你回来了，真不敢相信。你知道这个场景我想象过多少次吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Flight 17 now arriving at gate 9. This is the scene at Houston's George Bush intercontinental airport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 17号线抵达9号门，这是休斯顿乔治·布什洲际机场的一幕。

yingyinNormal.en: When I first moved out to LA, I did a topless scene in a low-budget horror movie about a killer gorilla.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我刚来洛杉矶那会儿，演了一部关于杀人大猩猩的小成本恐怖电影，我在那里面裸上身出镜!

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it's used incorrectly all the time. Even Bill Murray makes that mistake in the first scene of Ghostbusters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，它总是被用错，就连比尔默里在《捉鬼敢死队》的第一场戏中也错了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the place where something happens, especially something unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: Between 1807 and 1814 the Iberian Peninsula (comprising Spain and Portugal) was the <highlight>scene</highlight> of a titanic and merciless struggle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1807年至1814年间，伊比利亚半岛(包括西班牙和葡萄牙)是一场巨大且残酷的斗争现场。

examination_example.sentence: Artists and scientists have together rocked the <highlight>scenes</highlight> last month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术家和科学家上个月一起震撼了现场。

examination_example.sentence: The building has housed some of the nation's most significant diplomats and politicians and has been the <highlight>scene</highlight> of many historic events.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这座建筑曾是美国一些最重要的外交官和政治家的住所，也是许多历史事件的发生地。

sense_info_list.en: an event or a situation that you see, especially one of a particular type
a sequence of continuous action in a play, movie, opera, or book
a view that you see
one of the small sections that a play or an opera is divided into
an expression of great anger or similar feelings, often between two people, or an occasion when this happens
a particular area of activity and all the people or things connected with it

word_usage.usage: 熟词僻义：scene除了“景色；场景”之外，还有“发生地点，现场”的意思，如：the scene of the crime 案发现场。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“景色”，为可数名词，指部分景色，眼前的景色，常指动景，常带有美学和戏剧的含义，如道具、布景。
意为“景色”，指眼睛视力范围内的景色。
意为“景色”、“风景”，指全部景色，为不可数名词，常指自然景色或画出的风景，如舞台布景。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (尤指不愉快事件发生的)地点; 现场

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 风景优美的；舞台布景的；描绘事件的

word_family.mean: n. 发生地点；现场；一段情节；景象；场面；情景；景色；发脾气；当众吵闹；活动领域

sense_info_list.en: an event or a situation that you see, especially one of a particular type
a sequence of continuous action in a play, movie, opera, or book
a view that you see
the place where something happens, especially something unpleasant
sense_info_list.zh: (尤指不愉快事件发生的)地点; 现场

examination_example.sentence: The 500 firefighters at the <highlight>scene</highlight> then battled to prevent the flames from reaching the two main towers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现场的500名消防员随后奋力阻止火焰蔓延到两座主塔。

sense_info_list.en: a particular area of activity and all the people or things connected with it

exam_freq_info.chinese: (尤指不愉快事件发生的)地点; 现场

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 风景优美的；舞台布景的；描绘事件的

word_family.mean: n. 发生地点；现场；一段情节；景象；场面；情景；景色；发脾气；当众吵闹；活动领域

sense_info_list.en: an event or a situation that you see; especially one of a particular type

examination_example.sentence: The video is striking: The operation is familiar, but the <highlight>scene</highlight> looks like the end of the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这段视频引人注目：虽然行动我们很熟悉，但场景看起来像世界末日。

sense_info_list.en: a sequence of continuous action in a play; movie; opera; or book

examination_example.sentence: "I don't know if you remember, there was a <highlight>scene</highlight> in a subway station. That was not Gangnam. That was actually Songdo," says Jung Won Son, a professor of urban development at London's Bartlett School of Planning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伦敦巴特利特规划学院城市发展教授 Jung Won Son 表示：“不知道大家还记不记得，有一场戏是在地铁站。那不是江南区，实际上是松岛新城。”

sense_info_list.en: a view that you see

examination_example.sentence: The introduction of backpacks changed the lunch box <highlight>scene</highlight> a bit, he adds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他补充说，背包的引入稍微改变了午餐盒的场景。

sense_info_list.en: the place where something happens; especially something unpleasant
sense_info_list.zh: (尤指不愉快事件发生的)地点; 现场

sense_info_list.en: one of the small sections that a play or an opera is divided into
an expression of great anger or similar feelings; often between two people; or an occasion when this happens
a particular area of activity and all the people or things connected with it

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an event or a situation that you see, especially one of a particular type

examination_example.sentence: What is so breathtaking about the experience is the out-of-this-world <highlight>scenes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种体验如此令人惊叹的是那些不可思议的场景。

examination_example.sentence: It was a <highlight>scene</highlight> that had been repeated many times in the theater's 75-year history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这家剧院75年的历史中，这一幕重复了很多次。

examination_example.sentence: This tractive four takes you to some of San Francis's most cheerful holiday <highlight>scenes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这四张照片将带你领略圣弗朗西斯最令人愉快的节日场景。

sense_info_list.en: one of the small sections that a play or an opera is divided into

examination_example.sentence: Music could also be helping you with many other health problems behind the <highlight>scenes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 音乐也可以在幕后帮助你解决许多其他健康问题。

examination_example.sentence: He's the funniest stand-up comedian on the comedy <highlight>scene</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是喜剧界最滑稽的单口喜剧演员。

sense_info_list.en: a view that you see

examination_example.sentence: They show mountainous <highlight>scenes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们展示了山川绵延的景色。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 风景优美的；舞台布景的；描绘事件的

word_family.mean: n. 发生地点；现场；一段情节；景象；场面；情景；景色；发脾气；当众吵闹；活动领域

sense_info_list.en: an event or a situation that you see, especially one of a particular type

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>scene</highlight> of the national flag was taken by a smartphone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国旗的场景是用智能手机拍摄的。

examination_example.sentence: Thousands of people come to search for the <highlight>scenes</highlight> in the novel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成千上万的人来寻找小说中的场景。

examination_example.sentence: Go behind the <highlight>scenes</highlight> on the world famous Studio Tour to explore where Hollywood movies are made.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在世界著名的电影制片厂之旅中，深入幕后，探索好莱坞电影的制作地点。

sense_info_list.en: one of the small sections that a play or an opera is divided into

examination_example.sentence: We waited for hours for the <highlight>scene</highlight> to be shot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们等了好几个小时才拍完这个场景。

examination_example.sentence: What may happen next according to <highlight>Scene</highlight> 1？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据场景一，接下来会发生什么？

sense_info_list.en: a view that you see

examination_example.sentence: In the third couplet, the poet describes a peaceful <highlight>scene</highlight> to us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第三对联中，诗人向我们描述了一个宁静的场景。

examination_example.sentence: The light from the riverboat makes the dark <highlight>scene</highlight> a bit livelier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 河船的灯光使黑暗的场景更加生动。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays, we can see the <highlight>scene</highlight> everywhere in the life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，我们在生活中随处可见这样的景象。
